website_summaries.verdict: This projector mount comes with removable and extendable mounting arms for added convenience.
pros: Ensures you can install a projector onto a sloped ceiling or wall
Aluminum alloy extendable post is lightweight and rust resistant
Offers a tilt range of 25° and a swivel range of 360°
Comes with standard installation hardware and an installation manual to help you quickly set up the mount
cons: Comes with low-quality anchors to hold the mount in place

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to hang my projector out in my covered patio area for out door movies. Before I decided to just get it I was concerned that it wouldn't be the best for quality because of the low price compared to others. I mean it is going to hold my $900.00 projector about 6ft in the air... BUT I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. Was pretty easy to install and love the adjustability. Only issue I had was the arms that connect to the projector were a little finicky to adjust right, but I have an older projector and the mount points are not in the best position. Over all I would suggest this one, and price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Herbert

customer_reviews.title: This was actually fun to install
customer_reviews.text: This may have been the most fun to install since I was kid with lego blocks. This bracket is universal and should fit any projector you have. It was fun to figure out how many ways i could attach the base to my projector. Instructions were a little difficult to follow, but you start to see how many combos you can make this thing work. I had my fun trying different variations of the bracket. It is not hard to figure out. Comes with a ton of hardware to make it work with whatever you have. Easy to adjust where you need it and hides cables really well. Very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty projector mount
customer_reviews.text: This projector mount is super strong! Very well made (I was a bit surprised because of the very reasonible price). The reason that i selected this product over some ohters, is that it can rotate 90 degrees at two different locations. Perfect for what i need for my art studio. Thank you! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barnguirl

customer_reviews.title: Does what intended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheaper model projector to put in my shop to use for karaoke and summer time hang out. Versus building a shelf from the ceiling of my shop, I wanted a cost efficient bracket. I wasn't sure of the exact height, so this bracket was perfect for that has you can adjust it ever how you want, versus a lot of the others have fixed holes for adjusting. The price was great.... After tightening down the adjustments, there still could be some movement, but honestly, once you get it set up, nothing shouldn't be touching it allowing to to move. So, I gave it 5 stars for the product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Edluv

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for large projector...
customer_reviews.text: I have an Epson 3010 and this supposedly "Universal" mount does not extend far enough to connect to the projector so I have to build a wood plate to make it work. With that out of the way, I struggled as well with the flimsiness of the device, projector almost fell on the ground because the sliding plate, even tight to the max slided-off
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Romain

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Instructions Need Work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this ceiling mount for a few weeks now, so far, it works well. Seems sturdy and durable. Hasn't slipped the position I've placed it in and everyone who visits my office compliments its aesthetics. Installation was a bit tricky. The instructions are bare at best and I wasn't able to figure out how to use the mount without the extension (even though it advertises the extension is optional.) Better instructions would have shaved valuable time of installation but for the price, I'm okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: jason sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I never have high expectations when purchasing an item that can cost 10x as much. In this case, I am very happily surprised. Mounting as very easy. The only problem is that I had to add wood to the drop ceiling to get the projector below the tile. This is not the mount's fault. It seems that this will mount will almost if not all projectors. There are a lot of possible positions. I would not trust a very heavy and expensive mount with this as the metal is not extraordinarily thick.
customer_reviews.author: AAV

customer_reviews.title: great with one fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: So... It's the best mount I could buy, doubly for the price. However... It has a single MAJOR flaw. The adjustable mechanism that holds the projector is sketchy. It's just held in by a screw pressing against the post. I felt unsafe, so I super glued it. I would recommend everyone else do the same. If that piece fails, and some reviews show it has; your entire projector comes crashing to the ground. No catch, no safety, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Moz

customer_reviews.title: Pooor design!
customer_reviews.text: No safety stop to ensure locking of the length adjustment! My projector fell 16 feet! Amazon refunded me and gave me $50 but it does not make a dent in the Cost of a new projector! I put a tec screw through the body of it and added a safety chain to ensure that it did not happen again with my new projector. Yes it was installed correctly!!! The clamping mechanism on the adjuster does not tighten up enough to hold it tightly and slides off after a period of time. (2 weeks)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: The mount is very neatly made and I like all the aspects of this mount
customer_reviews.text: The mount is very neatly made and I like all the aspects of this mount. I have withheld one star because the instructions might have been a little clear. I am an engineer and it took couple tries for me to get it right. Overall very satisfied with the purchase. I would love to see some improvements in future. I like the fact that the configuration of the arms to attach to the projector has so much flexibility. Yon can be as creative as so possible. But just be sure that the overall surface area meet the specifications on the installing instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Srinidhi N Kaushik

customer_reviews.title: Limited angling, but good for flat ceiling straight forward application.
customer_reviews.text: Unit is nice and sturdy. Issue I have or have not figured out the puzzle to as of yet is if you hang it on a sloped ceiling, using the base tilt for that, then due to the alignment assembly of the product, you lose the capability to then also angle the projector up and down. Same issue applies to trying to mount straight out from a wall with the base flat and facing the projector forward. I am basically stuck using it as a telescope stand at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shatzer

customer_reviews.title: Cryptic instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: The assembled mount is pretty stable, however, the installation instruction is like deciphering an Egyptian language lol 😂 if you like to work on puzzles, then, buy this! I have to be fair on giving reviews. If it wasn’t for the cryptic installation piece, I would’ve given this 5 stars. Perhaps it’s about time to review and revise your instruction manual 😊
customer_reviews.author: BoothGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Needs more thought with brackets, hardware and spacers.
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s: Well designed. Sturdy. Lots of fasteners. Con’s: Missing fasteners for joining brackets brackets or No long brackets (for 3-point). All screws were too long and had to be cut. Inside diameter of plastic spacers were to large. Instructions were missing points of install. This should have been a simple install to the projector, but had to improvise joining 2 brackets with added hardware and cutting included hardware. I was actually pretty annoyed figuring out how to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Hacked it to create a cheap, retractable mount for my low ceiling
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, I hacked it to create a cheap, retractable mount for my low ceiling. I purchased 3 long #10 machine screws with locking nuts and some #10 flat washers to use as spacers. It works great Otherwise, it's a fine mount. Seems quality machined. Included plenty of different parts to accomodate a variety of installation configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Heenan

customer_reviews.title: Great... but has flaws for home theater.
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say this is a nice mount lots of flexibility for installation and more than decent quality. As for a dedicated home theater: If your project has a lens shift option you'll probably be fine. For me I don't. Installation has to be 100% to get a square image on a frame. If you dont have lens shift I would probably suggest getting a projector with better fine tuning ability. This will move in all directions but very hard to fine tune. For that I give it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: Versatile thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the wall instead of the ceiling to keep projector rightside up to keep heat exhaust fan from blowing directly into the fire sprinkler. Make sure to make pilot holes on the vertical studs first for the vertical bolts (without plastic anchors) and use plastic drywall anchors for horizontal bolts on drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: The product itself is sufficient for proper usage of most projectors. My main concern is the set screw for the extension arm out of the box was incapable of release. It was torqued down so tight that I could not get it loosened up with the provided allen wrench or one of my own with out stripping and destroying the set screw itself. After reaching out to the seller they were terrific and most helpful in sending a replacement part. I was able to successfully mount my projector and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis D Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good but annoying
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy for the price. The only complaiii have is its ability to stay where it's placed. This keeps tilting up ever so slightly and it's annoying. I have placed it perfectly and tightened everything down, still it moves under just a little rear weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knight

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy high priced when you can get better quality with this one!
customer_reviews.text: This projector mount is amazing. The setup was very easy and the mount holds my heavy projector with no problems. The best part about it is that I can change angles or mount position whenever I want by adjusting the screws, angling to my liking, then tightening them. When I buy another projector.... I will be purchasing this again for that one too. Advice: don't spend top dollar on another mount, this one will do the job (I have a epson 455wi and it isn't light). Hope this review helps you out.
customer_reviews.author: matthew h.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect listing...
customer_reviews.text: The mount is sturdy, seems well built and is easy to install. However, the listing states it extends to a minimum of 10.62" and max of 21.25". The max is right but the minimum is incorrect as shown in my photos at just under 14". I needed one that was short but not directly mounted to the ceiling. I have yet to mount this so we will see if it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: clever engineering,simple instructions, excellent outcome.
customer_reviews.text: Best projector mount ever....i rarely write reviews for anything I purchased, but this item deserves one. I used to work in the a/v field professionally, and this is the best mount I have ever dealt with for your lightweight projectors...this review doesn't not apply to usage on a 3-gun CRT. Perfect fitment in all accessories, clever engineering on extension assembly, and an overall solid feel for less than 20.00. If you are looking to mount a projector less than 20 pounds or so, look no further. There is no need to spend money on a Chief or equivalent, take the cheaper route this time, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Furzmeister

customer_reviews.title: Longer than I needed
customer_reviews.text: Like it just don't like the way the height adjustment. I needed it to be a shorter road but it is already comes in certain height so cannot reduce the height. So makesure the height is what you need before you buy
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: It is not white, more like a light gray / bone white
customer_reviews.text: My house is all white and I got this because it was white as they advertise. The color is more like a light gray. Not only did it not match with my white walls, it didn't match with my white projector. Didn't even bother installing it, sending it back now.
customer_reviews.author: E. Morales

customer_reviews.title: It just works after a reasonable install.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the adjustability. I had to install it at an angle to reach the center of the screen... WOW... I could. I did not like having to hold the nuts inside while getting bolts started: given the angle I did not have room and had to tape the nuts in place.
customer_reviews.author: MeccanoManStan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Does not work without extender.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are incomprehensible. Despite photos of the mount in use without the extender pole, there is no way to use it like that—missing a whole piece at least. It’s too late to return it so I guess I’m stuck with it, but it might just go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: catling

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Took about 20 min to set up, love having my projector ceiling mounted and out of the way. Matches my white projector, and looks great. Lots of adjustable settings, recommended if you have a larger projector.
customer_reviews.author: Santi F.

customer_reviews.title: Great mount
customer_reviews.text: Used this in our media room to drop our projector down. It was easy to install and made our projector easy to adjust at that level for the perfect screen angle. At the price it was also a steal compared to some out there. Easily fit onto my projector with the adjustable arms.
customer_reviews.author: AmznJunkieX

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, almost caused injury, ruined expensive property in the process
customer_reviews.text: My $2000 DLP projector is now destroyed after the insufficient slip fit if the telescopic portion of this mount slipped out and dropped the projector onto the floor, just about hitting my girlfriend in the head on the way down. My projector is well under the weight limit and the mounting hardware was all very tight. This is NOT an acceptable product for hanging 30lb items over a persons head... and now my projector is ruined too. Yea you can refund your $20 mount, but what about my $2000 projector?!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Lebel II

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Lots of fine tuning available to get your projection just right. I was afraid to really crank down on the screws to tighten everything, but you can put reasonable torque on it so you feel comfortable that it won't fall down on you. I really liked that you could run cables though the downrod. Ample mounting hardware is also included.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile mount for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This mount provided the adjust-ability that I needed. It allows me to swing forward or backward, lower, tilt and rotate the projector. The materials are Ok and should handle sub 10lb projectors. The only thing to gripe is that I needed to buy extra washers for my projector as the ones provided were too small, with less than a buck problem was solved. Overall good mount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, simple assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, cheap ceiling mount. Gets the job done without much hassle. Feels a little cheap, but who cares, it works great. BTW, the J screw heads are too tiny, they go right through the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Abe T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mount
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I thought it's pretty complicated assembling process because the directions are not that clear. Once I figured it out how to assemble, I had no problem. I am very handy with assembling, so it wasn't too bad for me. Maybe for some people that have a hard time to assemble, they would have a hard time to sample this one . I would definitely buy it again if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: This seem to be a good quality projector mount
customer_reviews.text: This seem to be a good quality projector mount, it just didn't fit our projector so we are returning it. I really wish it did fit because it looked like it would be a great one! And the price can't be beat! We did measure our projector first as the seller suggests and by our measurements it should have worked. That is why I am not giving it 5 stars. Really bummed it didn't work out for us. We have the epson emp-tw550
customer_reviews.author: hooperae

customer_reviews.title: defective part
customer_reviews.text: Defective part, called number and nobody answered the phone. Left message with no response. Fix with my own parts. Works well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: gerard

customer_reviews.title: Needs modifications
customer_reviews.text: Not too excited about this...not horrible for the price, i guess, but the way the vertical adjustment works needs major improvement. Had it tightened all the way when my daughter bumped one of the wires and the projector fell from the ceiling. I am going to have to drill and screw the 2 main peices together so this cant happen again. Edit: I will give there customer service 4 stars. They contacted me about my problem to find out more so they can look into making it better.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Long screws caution for those with drop ceilings
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my needs,installed easily,just wish I thought things through better as I put 4 holes in the floor of the living room of the people that live above me (I have drop ceiling) screws were linger than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Park

customer_reviews.title: Great Mount, and  Amazing customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great mount...easy to install, and most importantly the hardware is well made. This has a three way pivot to align to your screen. I gave three stars because I was missing a cross bar. Every pic shows four...I got three....but was able to make it work. Change review to FIVE STARS...in 24 hrs they offered me a partial refund for the missing part. It wasn't about the money...the customer service is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected, but lots of parts helped make it work.
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the picture, this mount is not as large as you think it is. Definitely check the measurements to make sure it will work for you. In the end I got this mount working by combining some of the parts with another mount I had, thankfully this mount comes with a lot of parts so it can be made compatible with almost any projector.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good projector mount
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome projector mount. I have it mounted with my Wowoto mini projector. It was easy to figure out and install. You can customize to suit your needs and different types of projectors. You can hide your wires in the stem so it looks good and clean. I would definitely recommend this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Marty the 1 Man Party

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  mount
customer_reviews.text: I like this. If you have a high ceiling or even an angled one this one is pretty flexible and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Daryl G. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great universal ceiling mount!
customer_reviews.text: This truly was universal. It fit my somewhat obscure projector and holds it very securely. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh L. Millis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walls or cellings.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Many different ways to mount it. Everything is included in the box! I dont screw in the projector I only place it on the mount, for portability purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Marco naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value. We were about to purchase a ceileing ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value. We were about to purchase a ceileing mount for our projector at Best Buy and so glad we went with this instead. Saved us so much money and it works perfectly. If I ever install another ceiling mounted projector, buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well , could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mount due to the price and the extended arm, it assembles perfectly and looks great but it is not compatible with bigger projectors although it could have been. overall it works well for my Epson HC3100 after a trip to lowes, it could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector mount
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my projector. It took a bit of time figuring out how to assemble it, but once it was finished, it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sleek White blends into the cieling, Definitely worth the $15
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain. It looks nice, we had to cut the mount part in half to fit our set-up, but after being installed I have no complaints. The directions aren't the best, but it's not a very complicated mount; you should be able to make it work with what they give you for hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Good: Heavy duty aluminum contruction. Con: The extension boom could fall off if you mount it vertically. The clamp is not strong enough to hold the extension tubes together.
customer_reviews.author: Trcv

customer_reviews.title: Good but one glaring oversight.
customer_reviews.text: A good cheap one. But make sure you drill and put a screw into the extension to keep it from sliding as there is NO stop to keep it together. It will slip and drop to the floor with your projector on it. (I caught it)

customer_reviews.title: Very good if you are going to mount it and forget ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good if you are going to mount it and forget it. Had an issue with one of the "bolts" stripping it's hold so I'm going to go buy a new nut but for me, I need something I can put up and take down so I'm going to revisit once I get it all done. Do like the cable hiding and multiple adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lertora

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of extra parts
customer_reviews.text: I liked how they gave a variety of parts to make it universal.
customer_reviews.author: slimm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Alsi comes with a great package of fasteners!!! Is sturdy and easy to level when in use.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great mounting kit.
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable length and adjustable adapter Along with price was what sold me.
customer_reviews.author: Rs2sroke

customer_reviews.title: If your not a good handy man like me it's a struggle to set ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has tons of screws and takes a lot of time to set up. If your not a good handy man like me it's a struggle to set up. Once up it's good. If they made this product easier to set up i Would of paid double. It's a pain in the butt getting it set up right with monitor. Lots of tiny little pieces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy peezy!
customer_reviews.text: The ceiling mount was easy to assemble & went up quickly. It worked perfectly in my Man Cave & I can now watch my programs on my movie screen! The design easily hid the wires for a clean professional look!
customer_reviews.author: William Fosth

customer_reviews.title: Think again
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled when it came to attaching the projector to the base. It was difficult. I had to modify it using a different brand in the docking. Once docking was complete, the product worked perfectly. Easy to adjust and set.
customer_reviews.author: J-Ro

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut mines because it was kinda long
customer_reviews.author: KennyK923

customer_reviews.title: Projector holder
customer_reviews.text: It is working great. It did fall one time with the projector attached, luckily no damage was done. I am not sure if I didn’t have it tightened enough or what exactly caused it. But it hasn’t happened again.
customer_reviews.author: awesome monkey21

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very complete with lots of install options. Very sturdy and very surprising for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Washers are too big fit the bolts!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to mount our Dell 1610HD projector and had a very difficult time matching the projector to the supplied mounting bracket. The bracket comes with a variety of different sized bolts. The Dell 1610 requires the smallest of the bolts and requires the supplied washers. Problem is the bolt head is too small for the washers.... Screws up the whole system... no pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Projector shakes when the mount is extended
customer_reviews.text: It is somewhat flimsy when extended and if someone is walking on the floor above your ceiling, the projector will shake.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble but very reliable once installed
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to support my main media viewer. I found it (fully assembled) quite excellent. However putting it together was difficult. The synthesis of the mount to the projectors structure was unclear and portrayed with no effort. But once figured out, it was sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Srijitha Rudich

customer_reviews.title: I don't see how it really has any integrated cord options like the description says
customer_reviews.text: Comes with lots of screws and other parts to adapt to your projector. I don't see how it really has any integrated cord options like the description says.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comes with all pieces you need to fit any projector. Easy to setup. Comes with the Alan key you need. You will need a #2 Philips screwdriver to mount it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Justinmh1634

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mounting bracket and was able to successfully mount my Abox A6 projector to my ceiling with no problems. The bracket can be moved in any angle to get the perfect position for your projector. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Good mount, but....
customer_reviews.text: Good mount, but the screws would not tighten in the anchors, which made me have to use additional anchors/screws to securely get the mounting bracket up against the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Had to make a couple modifications to get it just the way I wanted but works great now.
customer_reviews.author: DW Dub

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy mount
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not very clear and took some time to figure out. The mount is sturdy and had a lot of adjustments for height, vertical and horizontal angles.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great option for projector mounting
customer_reviews.text: The mount works great, and does everything as advertised. The only downsides I can give is that it is unintuitive on putting it together even with directions, and it doesn't come with any spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great, but thanks measurements of projector
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, had to make some modifications for it to fit our projector because it wasn't big enough. But the mount is sturdy and is very easily adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a Benq th671st. I mounted this to the floor joists above a drop ceiling and let it hang down through. The mount works great with adjust in every direction. All metal sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pieces work fine, but the tension bolt holding the extension rod ...
customer_reviews.text: pieces work fine, but the tension bolt holding the extension rod was so tight that i stripped it trying to loosen it with the supplied allen wrench. i don't need the extension though so i guess i'll keep it
customer_reviews.author: Austin Willard

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works great with optoma ep771 720p and fire stick 100 inch TV for the bedroom that's how we roll
customer_reviews.author: marc cormier

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: All parts you need are included, and installation is super easy. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, good solution to hang my projector. It took a little bit to figure out how to secure it to my projector, but it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Mounts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any size use plus attaches to any angle needed..
customer_reviews.author: Rey Soc Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Good projector mount. lots of adjusability allows you to get the perfect angle for your screen. This was important to me since my project was a cheap one off amazon and lacks adjustablility in itself.
customer_reviews.author: max sayedzada

customer_reviews.title: Not good.  Get something else!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Please spend a few more dollars on something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great....needs to be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Is not as sturdy as I would like it to be...but it does the job. At least it doesn't move when fan of projector is on...
customer_reviews.author: Abimael H. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works great the viewing area  is 12'×6' great for mlm movie time
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy not sure if an idiot could do it but oh well
customer_reviews.author: Single again sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Not so great fro Wall Mounting
customer_reviews.text: The mounting and adjustment are anything but simple. After mounting it to the wall and trying to get it straight and level, I think I just got lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Zubeyir

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This isn't exactly "Universal" had to make some adjustments but it gets it done.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tuckier

customer_reviews.title: Simple and secure mount
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install for my Optoma projector. All necessary hardware included. Looks great, and holds projector securely.
customer_reviews.author: Aeroboy

customer_reviews.title: Yes. It works. And there are so many extra pieces for later use, if needed.  THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Easy-ish ceiling install. Except for one screw that jammed, because I am unused to installing a ceiling mounted anything. (I used Toggle bolts in other areas.) Luckily, I call that screw, the Fashion Accessory and will use it as part of the way I run wire across the ceiling to the peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: J&C Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly met our needs. We were hanging a projector in the garage and needed aomething we could retract back above the beams when we were done using it. It swung up and out od the way. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: mike midmay

customer_reviews.title: Unless you're looking for a science project, stay away from this one!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in hundreds of pieces, beware! Requires assembly, very poorly written instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Instruction form needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions form needs to be redone. The illustrations indicate a part that isn't included. Otherwise great value.
customer_reviews.author: smack

customer_reviews.title: Great ceiling mount
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - instructions could be a bit bigger and clearer - but nice product - universally adaptable - no bolts for the Epson projector - had to find those elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: A. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Minimum Height description
customer_reviews.text: When the extended pole is used, the description says minimum height is 10.62". But it is actually around 14". There is no way to get below 14". And the swivel movement is not sturdy. What ever angle you move, it is coming back to the original position.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, and good product. The design makes it easy to run wires through it.
customer_reviews.author: Nouriefamily

customer_reviews.title: It's not a perfect fit which is to be expected from a Universal ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfect fit which is to be expected from a Universal mount but it works fine, my only complaint is how easy it was to strip the bolts requiring me to use a socket wrench to fully tighten the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Carothers

customer_reviews.title: perfect mount
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a quick mount for a projector hanging from pipe in a theatre - works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suptek mount
customer_reviews.text: Was an amazing product however it didn’t fit my particular projector so I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good price but not good quality control
customer_reviews.text: Bought half a year ago, just unbox and want to install it yesterday Found the screw which are designed to fasten the extendable arm doesn't work in that way. Should I trash it or just connect the 2section of arms with a metal screw?
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good projector mount
customer_reviews.text: This projector mount is really good for the price and it’s easy to install
customer_reviews.author: M. Elie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value item.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. Instructions could be better/colored. Need wrench and drill to install.
customer_reviews.author: H Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good Mount
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to figure out and to get to stay in the position you want it in but its very sturdy and holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Soares

customer_reviews.title: Look for a ceiling mount with less assembly problems
customer_reviews.text: Annoyingly complicated assembly of too many parts increases chances of the "catastrophic failure" (falling projector).
customer_reviews.author: G.D. Hamann

customer_reviews.title: Works good but needs better anchors and split washers
customer_reviews.text: Mount works good but hand to change the anchors to toggle bolts because they wear not strong enough to hold in the ceiling. Also add split washer to get the mount to hold in position better.
customer_reviews.author: DeAndre Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and it was very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: anilumias

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable, easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it was easily adjustable easy to mount. The only thing I wish was that it was available in black I couldn’t find a black option ... but it serves my purpose perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: suptek White Universal Projector Ceiling Mount Bracket Fits Flat or Sloped Ceiling Height Adjustable with Extendable Length for LCD/DLP Projectors (PR05)
product_meta.description: Color:Ceiling/wall-extendable-whiteWhen PR05 leave our factory, the screw on the extension pole is not fully tightened, which is to prevent the customer from scratching yourselves by pulling the extension pole forcibly. Please do tighten the screw on the extension pole and the base during your installation. Suptek PR05WILL NOT work for your projector, if your projector has holes on the diagonal more than 12''/30. 5cm apart or weighs more than 30lbs/13. 6kg. Please check specifications to see if this mount is compatible with your projector. SPECIFICATIONS: 1. Maximum weight supported: 30lbs/13. 6kg2. Height adjust from 10. 62'' to 21. 25'' (27 - 54 cm). 3. Ceilings Supported: Regular ceilings (drywall or wooden beams)4. Heavy duty aluminum alloy construction5. Color: White6. Adjustments: Tilt Range 90° up/down; Pan/Swivel Range 360°. Note: This mount does support the vaulted ceiling/wall. *3-YEAR ; If you have ANY issues, please contact us.
feature_bullets: 3-In-1 Projector Wall Mount Bracket - ceiling installation, sloped ceiling installation, and wall installation
Universal - compatible with projectors whose mounting holes are under 12" and weight under 30lbs (13.6kg)
Resistant to rust - ceiling part and projector mounting part are made of cold rolled steel, extendable pole is made of aluminium alloy
Adjustable - tilt 90°up/down, pan/swivel 360°, height from 1.96"-21.25",suitable for different circumstance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars537 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
